Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.javaee.rules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyzeJSPFileRuleProvider
    Extracts type references from JSP files.
    CreateEJBReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of EJB data (eg, a list of EJB session beans).
    CreateHibernateReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of Hibernate files within the application (eg, session configuration or entity lists).
    CreateJPAReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of JPA files within the application (eg, session configuration or entity lists).
    CreateRemoteReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of EJB data (eg, a list of EJB session beans).
    CreateServerResourcesReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report of Server Resources within the application (eg, datasources, jms resources).
    CreateSpringBeanReportRuleProvider
    Creates a report on the Spring configuration (Spring beans, etc.).
    DiscoverEjbAnnotationsRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with EJB related annotations, and adds EJB related metadata for these.
    DiscoverEjbConfigurationXmlRuleProvider
    Discovers ejb-jar.xml files and parses the related metadata
    DiscoverHibernateConfigurationRuleProvider
    Discovers Hibernate Configuration Files (eg, hibernate.cfg.xml), extracts their metadata, and places this metadata into the graph.
    DiscoverHibernateMappingRuleProvider
    Discovers the hibernate.hbm.xml files.
    DiscoverJaxRsAnnotationsRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with JAX-RS related annotations, and adds JAX-RS related metadata for these.
    DiscoverJaxWSAnnotationsRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with JAX-WS related annotations, and adds JAX-WS related metadata for these.
    DiscoverJPAAnnotationsRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with JPA related annotations, and adds JPA related metadata for these.
    DiscoverJpaConfigurationXmlRuleProvider
    Discovers persistence.xml files and parses the related metadata
    DiscoverJsfSourceFileRuleProvider
    Discovers JSF files in the input application.
    DiscoverRemoteEjbRuleProvider
    Discovers remote interfaces and marks them for reporting.
    DiscoverRmiRuleProvider
    Scans for classes with JAX-WS related annotations, and adds JAX-WS related metadata for these.
    DiscoverSpringConfigurationFilesRuleProvider
    Discovers spring configuration XML files, and places the metadata into the Graph.
    DiscoverWebXmlRuleProvider
    Discovers web.xml files, parses them, and places relevant metadata into the graph.
    JspFileMappingRuleProvider
    Insures that basic JSP file extensions are mapped to JspSourceFileModel.
    ResolveServerResourceLinksRuleProvider
    Links server resources (datasources, jms, etc) to EAP 6 resource setup documentation
